    List<RecommendationDto>
    RecManager.generateRecommendationsByTags(List<String> tags)
    Generates recommendations filtered by one or more dietary tags.
    List<RecommendationDto>
    RecManager.generateRecommendationsByTags(List<String> tags, Double userLat, Double userLng)
    Generates tag-based recommendations and ranks them by proximity.
